short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks if websites distribute ADEM emblems over DNS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ADEM is a system to issue and distribute digital emblems. Digital emblems are intended to signal that a digital entity is protected under International Humanitarian Law the same ways as the physical emblems of the red cross, crescent, and crystal do. As of now, ADEM is in a testing phase entities labelled with digital emblems using ADEM are not protected under IHL.

This extension can check if a website is labelled with ADEM using DNS. As of publishing this extension, only the site https://emblem.felixlinker.de is labelled using ADEM.
